description: This PHP source file defines a class `csrfprotector_rdkb` which extends a base class `csrfprotector`. It includes a static method `logCSRFattack()` that appears to be intended for logging CSRF attacks but is currently empty. The file begins with licensing information and includes another PHP file `csrfprotector.php`. Its purpose relates to CSRF protection in the web application, specifically for the RDKB platform.

classes.name: csrfprotector_rdkb
classes.description: A class extending csrfprotector to implement platform-specific CSRF protection features, including a method to log CSRF attacks.

methods.name: logCSRFattack
methods.description: A static method intended to log CSRF attack attempts; currently a placeholder with no implementation.
